glossary: a bacterial toxin that has been weakened until it is no longer toxic but is strong enough to induce the formation of antibodies and immunity to the specific disease caused by the toxin; "diphtheria toxoid"
a ring-shaped surface generated by rotating a circle around an axis that does not intersect the circle
burning hot; extremely and unpleasantly hot; "the torrid noonday sun"; "sultry sands of the dessert"
slow and apathetic; "she was fat and inert"; "a sluggish worker"; "a mind grown torpid in old age"
exceedingly bad; "when she was bad she was horrid"
